summary: Chronicles May 1970, the month in which four students were shot dead at Kent State. The mayhem that followed has been called the most divisive moment in American history since the Civil War.
cast: Gregory Antoine|Terry Braun|Pat Buchanan|Gerald Casale|Gail Collins|Laura Davis|Carolyn Knox|Tim Naftali|Ron Orem|Rick Perlstein|Mark Rudd|Ron Snyder|Lafayette Tolliver
title: The Day the '60s Died
